title: Weekly Classes!
text: Unlock your coding potential with our weekly coding classes! Whether you're a beginner or more advanced, our Scratch, Python, and HTML courses are for kids of all ages. Fully online, these classes are convenient and easy to attend! Sign up today and start your journey with CodeWise weekly classes.

title: Summer Camp 2024!
text: Ignite your child's passion for technology at our CodeWise Summer Camp! Designed for kids of all skill levels, our camp offers a fun and interactive environment where they can learn programming basics, create exciting projects, and have fun! Perfect for beginners and more advanced students, it’s a great way to explore the world of coding this summer. It’s also fully online! Enroll today!
